name: cc-track
description: Task Review And Context Keeper: Keep your vibe coding on track
author: Craig

scripts.check: bun run embed && bun run typecheck && bun run lint
scripts.build:linux: bun run prebuild && bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/cc-track-linux
scripts.build:windows: bun run prebuild && bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/cc-track-windows.exe
scripts.build:cross-platform: bun run build:linux && bun run build:windows
scripts.build:hooks: for hook in edit-validation pre-compact post-compact capture-plan stop-review; do bun build src/hooks/$hook.ts --compile --outfile dist/hooks/$hook; done
